content.p: If you work at the University, it’s important you understand how things work and the way your job is structured. This includes knowing what job family you’re part of, the hours you have to work and how our pay scale works. We recommend that you familiarise yourself with our key information, policies and guidance. If you need more information, our HR team can explain anything you need to know. What you need to know about working here: A-Z of services A-Z of policies Forms
